titleInfo.title: Johnnie Braggs and Ramona Bridges at the Elks Club

mods.abstract: One color window card (red on white) announcing Johnnie Braggs with Ramona Bridges, Christine Kittrell and Kid King Combo at the Elks Club on June 28.
